Today is the anniversary of the Northridge earthquake, a day our community will never forget. As we learned that day, it's a matter of when - not if - the next big one will strike. 

Make sure you and your loved ones have an emergency kit ready. https://twitter.com/NBCLA/status/1218232299705241600 …

Just had an interesting conversation with @usagmceo Grant Turner, who heads America’s efforts to communicate truth worldwide, regarding communicating in the Sindhi language. Which media platforms are best: TV, Medium Wave Radio, Short Form Video for internet, web pages, or other?

"It was all about Joe Biden, Hunter Biden...it was never about corruption". The revelations by #LevParnas make clear that it was never about promoting US national security objectives, which include an independent democratic Ukraine, free from corruption. https://nbcnews.to/363FB2V

Congrats to Virginia on passing the #EqualRightsAmendment! I am a proud co-sponsor of the Equal Rights Amendment in Congress and the time for ratification of the Amendment is now.

The rule of law matters. Republicans can’t simply let #Trump hide thousands of documents and block witness testimony simply because they are afraid of what they might reveal. #DefendOurDemocracy pic.twitter.com/U7N45YRLGd

Our Afghan policy illustrates that we are good at breaking things but not very good at fixing them. The Special Inspector General for Afghanistan Reconstruction claims had the US done a “D” job in #Afghanistan, we would have been successful. Watch here: https://bit.ly/388HtsL

Today the House unanimously passed my bill, the Homeless Assistance Act of 2019, which would help address our country’s #homelessness crisis by allowing increased data sharing between the organizations working on the front lines of this issue.

Today on #KoreanAmericanDay, we commemorate the first wave of Korean immigrants to the United States and celebrate the profound impact generations of Korean Americans have had on shaping and enriching our country.

(2/2) I expect the report to indicate what restrictions the Ambassador faced, in particularly, whether or not the Ambassador was able to visit detainees. The visit and report are valuable only to the extent of the access given. https://reut.rs/37Z1guv

(1/2) I've been pushing for the U.S. Ambassador to visit #Kashmir for a long time, most noticeable in my comments to Assistant Secretary Wells in our hearing on 10/22/19. I look forward to getting Ambassador Juster's report.

The Senate has conducted 15 (2 Presidents, 13 others, mostly judges) #impeachment trials in American history. It heard witnesses in every one. That’s what a trial is. #DefendOurDemocracy https://twitter.com/RobertMaguire_/status/1215344141472800774 …
(2/2) I have spent 23 years trying to stop Iran's nuke program; #Trump's comments on hitting cultural sites undermined that effort.

One year ago, I was proud to cosponsor #HR8, the Bipartisan Background Checks Act and to say #EnoughIsEnough. Our communities deserve to feel safer from gun violence, it’s time for McConnell to put this bill up for a vote in the Senate.

McConnell & @realDonaldTrump are out of excuses. The #Senate cannot be complicit in Trump's attempt to block key witnesses from testifying or conceal vital documents. The American people deserve to see all the facts. #DefendOurDemocracy https://nyti.ms/2N3grLk
To my Orthodox and other Christian friends celebrating Christmas today, #MerryChristmas!
